name: Friendly Arena Demo
description:
Friendly Arena is A Physics Based Multiplayer Game Set in Fun Minigames with up to 20 players in each server (being developed by one person), but the DEMO is only SINGLEPLAYER since Multiplayer is not fully ready and requires subsystem but you can still play with bots and try the game :D

My goal is to have at least 15 Game Modes in Friendly Arena ( Demo currently have 3 Game Modes and 1 Testing Level to test some of the content that aren't in the Demo )

Extra Things not mentioned in the Demo:
1- to use the Taser Gun in the Testing Ground, press LMB or RMB to aim then RMB to shoot, it can only shoot when the battery is at 100% (you can see the battery above the health bar)
2- you can spectate bots by pressing RMB or LMB when you're dead, and you can take control of that bot by pressing " F "
3- Swipe-Out Gamemode and Testing Ground can be reload the level by pressing " R "

For Bug Reports and Suggestions, send an email to FriendlyArenaBugs@gmail.com
